Method Detail

getStaffArguments

@SystemAPI
public ArgumentList getStaffArguments(java.lang.String staff)
Gets the arguments needed for the creation of new staff

Parameters:
staff - the type of staff to be created
Returns:
an array of PublicArguments which, when answered, can be used for the creation of a new staffmember of the given type
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the admin is not logged in
NotAFactoryException - the given type does not exist in this world

makeStaffMember

@SystemAPI
public java.lang.String makeStaffMember(java.lang.String staff,
                                                  ArgumentList argv)
Creates a new staff member

Parameters:
staff - the type of staff to be created
argv - the arguments to the creation of the new staff member
Returns:
the details of newly created staff member
Throws:
NotAFactoryException - the given type does not exist in this world
NotLoggedInException - the admin is not logged in
WrongArgumentListException - the given arguments did not match the type of staff
SchedulableAlreadyExistsException - this staff member already exists in this world
InvalidArgumentException - thrown if the list or one of the arguments is null, or if the answer does not satisfy the constraints.
CannotChangeException

getAvailableStaffFactories

@SystemAPI
public java.lang.String[] getAvailableStaffFactories()
Gets the available types of staff that can be created

Returns:
an array of strings containing names of the types of staff
